Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: high-explosive anti-tank
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Shaped charge warhead. Detonates on impact, creating a super-heated stream of molten metal that punches through enemy armor.

Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: thermobaric
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Disperses and subsequently ignites a fuel-air explosive mix, creating a powerful explosion and potentially igniting flammable objects.

Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.label: fragmentation
Combat_Realism.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to explode into a cloud of deadly shrapnel, shredding soft targets in a large area.
